title: League is installing very slowly.
body:
Usually my internet goes up to 1000KBps when installing things but for some reason, League is downloading files at 200 Kbps. What can I do to increase the download speed?

(ETA is fluctuating between 820-840 minutes. I can't keep my laptop open for 13-14 hours!)

replies.body: If you aren't seeing any errors, it's best to wait and let the download finish up on it's own. If you want to try and increase your speed, you could try a simple fix like downloading it while connected via ethernet instead of wifi. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for other ways you can get a more stable connection.
